Package persistence.CharacterPersistence

Class CharacterDAOAPI

java.lang.Object
persistence.CharacterPersistence.CharacterDAOAPI
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharacterDAO
public class CharacterDAOAPI extends Object implements CharacterDAO
Class that contains all the methods needed related to creating, deleting and reading the API that contains the characters.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CharacterDAOAPI()
    Constructor of the method, creates an ApiHelper class to reader and write, and a gson with the serializer and deserializer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createCharacter(Character character)
    method that gets a Character and write it in the api, in the java file we need to read all the characters in the file and save them again, in the api we don't have the override problem.
    Character[]
    readAll()
    Method that reads all characters from the api.
    void
    removeCharacter(int ind)
    Method to remove a character for the API. it gets the index of the character position and delete it.
    void
    writeAll(List<Character> character)
    Method to write all the list of characters that we get in the api.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterDAOAPI

      public CharacterDAOAPI() throws ApiConection
      Constructor of the method, creates an ApiHelper class to reader and write, and a gson with the serializer and deserializer.
      Throws:
      ApiConection - an exception that it's throwed when we cant make the connection with the API.

  • Method Details

    • writeAll

      public void writeAll(List<Character> character)
      Method to write all the list of characters that we get in the api.
      Specified by:
      writeAll in interface CharacterDAO
      Parameters:
      character - a list of Characters that we need to write

    • readAll

      public Character[] readAll()
      Method that reads all characters from the api.
      Specified by:
      readAll in interface CharacterDAO
      Returns:
      a array of Characters that are in the api, if it's empty we return a empty array.

    • createCharacter

      public void createCharacter(Character character)
      method that gets a Character and write it in the api, in the java file we need to read all the characters in the file and save them again, in the api we don't have the override problem.
      Specified by:
      createCharacter in interface CharacterDAO
      Parameters:
      character - one instance of character that we will save in the file.

    • removeCharacter

      public void removeCharacter(int ind)
      Method to remove a character for the API. it gets the index of the character position and delete it.
      Specified by:
      removeCharacter in interface CharacterDAO
      Parameters:
      ind - integer that contains the index of the character that we need to delete.
